translations: 教化，熏陶；改善，改进；使文明，使开化

sentences.sentence: "I think it would civilize people a bit more if they had decent conditions."—"I think you've hit the nail on the head."
sentences.translation: “我认为如果人们有好的条件，就会使其更有教养一点。”—“我想你说到点子上了。”

sentences.sentence: "My primary concern is: How can I soften or civilize this message?" says etiquette expert Dana Casperson.
sentences.translation: “我主要关心的是：我怎样才能温和或文明地传达这条消息？”礼仪专家丹纳·卡斯帕森说。

sentences.sentence: They tried to civilize the natives.
